DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial investigate effectiveness biphasic insulin aspart 30 type 2 diabetic achieve blood sugar level treat oral anti-diabetics drug ( OADs ) without basal insulin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Type 2 Diabetics Failing OADs
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus least 12 month HbA1c : 7.510.0 % An antidiabetic regimen stable least 3 month Able willing perform SMBG test per protocol Use insulin preparation NPH glargine within past 6 month Pregnancy , breastfeeding , intention become pregnant within next 12 month , judge use inadequate contraceptive measure ( adequate contraceptive measure include : sterilization , intrauterine device , oral contraceptive , consistent use barrier method ) Known suspect allergy trial product agent related trial product
